activities: The personal EU data received by Meridian Knowledge Solutions, LLC (MKSL) will be collected through our Client’s business partner portal and passed into the Client Learning Management System (LMS) hosted by MKSL.  MKSL does not use personal data stored within any of its hosted LMS applications for any purpose other than user account creation and training records tracking.  At times, our Client(s) may export training records data in order to provide this information for compliance and other corporate reporting purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data processed may include but is not limited to organization, client and customer data. Data covered may include manually processed data.
recoursemech: MKSL agrees to cooperate and comply with the European data protection authorities (DPAs) & Swiss FDPIC regarding all types of data.
